game.title: The Missing Prince
game.objective: Find the missing prince who has been kidnapped by an evil wizard.
game.description: The prince has been kidnapped by an evil wizard hiding in a secret lair. The player must navigate a treacherous forest, combat monsters, and solve puzzles to rescue him and bring him back to safety.
game.reward: A powerful magical sword and a rare potion will be the reward for completing the quest.

task.objective: Travel to Darkwood Forest and locate the wizard's lair.
task.description: The forest is filled with peril - be cautious and use your wits to overcome challenges.

task.objective: Defeat the wizard's guards and seek out the missing prince.
task.description: The lair is guarded by fierce creatures. Approach with caution and determination.

task.objective: Return the prince to King Oberon at King's Castle and claim your reward.
task.description: Once found, deliver the prince to the king and expect a just reward for your heroic endeavor.
